thread.title: Why Valero Energy (VLO) Could Be a Top Value Stock Pick - Tale of the Tape
thread.title_full: Why Valero Energy (VLO) Could Be a Top Value Stock Pick - Tale of the Tape

title: Why Valero Energy (VLO) Could Be a Top Value Stock Pick - Tale of the Tape
text:
Content preferences Done 
Value investing is always a very popular strategy, and for good reason. After all, who doesnâ€™t want to find stocks that have low PEs, solid outlooks, and decent dividends? 
Fortunately for investors looking for this combination, we have identified a strong candidate which may be an impressive value; Valero Energy Corporation (VLO). 
Valero Energy in Focus 
VLO may be an interesting play thanks to its forward PE of 8.2, its P/S ratio of 0.3, and its decent dividend yield of 2.47%. These factors suggest that Valero Energy is a pretty good value pick, as investors have to pay a relatively low level for each dollar of earnings, and that VLO has decent revenue metrics to back up its earnings. 
But before you think that Valero Energy is just a pure value play, it is important to note that it has been seeing solid activity on the earnings estimate front as well. For current year earnings, the consensus has gone up by 10.2% in the past 30 days, thanks to 9 upward revision in the past one month compared to no lower revision. 
This estimate strength is actually enough to push VLO to a Zacks Rank #2 (Buy), suggesting it is poised to outperform. So really, Valero Energy is looking great from a number of angles thanks to its PE below 20, a P/S ratio below one, and a strong Zacks Rank, meaning that this company could be a great choice for value investors at this time.
